channel.title: Posts on Hugo Boss
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hugo Boss

item.title: Read Me
item.description: hugo-boss Sample static site using Hugo status site generator with github pages. Love it so far. Very fast, seems flexible, easy to build site or blog. Themes are kind of a pain, mainly finding a good one is difficult without rolliing your own. Still looking for one I like. Local Dev Setup To setup on a new workstation: Install hugo and verify install > brew install hugo > hugo version To build and compile the static site, run hugo (build is extremely fast)

item.title: Post 1
item.description: Hugo is the Boss! Just testing this out Is it better than Jekyll? Supposed to be fast, we’ll see. Yes, it’s freakin fast, easy to author, build and see changes locally almost instantly.
